Author: SecretIdentity8594
Text: SAME  But I also feel so bad when people notice and worry...

Author: Little-Rexy
Text: I care about you- ya not in a creepy old guy way. Promise- I have the most beautiful wife known to the world. I am very blessed in that way. My Anorexia however knows your pain. You are just you - continue to share, and break down the walls that are holding back your ability to have everyone notice you- your voice is strong and worthy- hugs.
